user_query: Phantom Thread was directed by Paul Thomas Anderson and stars Daniel Day-Lewis and his supposedly final role and I am clearly not in my normal set I'm actually in LA right now with my wife we for the very first time ever received an invite to the Critics Choice Awards which is happening tomorrow and we're gonna get to go to that which is kind of nuts I've been trying to become a member of the Broadcast Film Critics Association for many years I've actually been emailing them for two years and I finally got a bit of a response and on Thanksgiving Day last year actually I found out that I was officially approved which was really awesome Thanksgiving present and that means I get to go the Critics Choice Awards every year which is really cool and yeah so that's why I'm here in LA we're doing that and since I was here I was like got to see Phantom Thread because that hasn't opened yet in Ohio and I really wanted to see it and I got to see it in 70-millimeter which is even cooler and this film is about a meticulous dressmaker in 1950s London played by Daniel Day-Lewis who meets a woman named Alma who becomes at first his muse eventually his lover and problems eventually arrives because Daniel Day-Lewis's character Reynolds is a very serious artist I wouldn't really say he views himself as a fashion designer he probably views himself more like an artist he will sit with his notepad in the mornings and try to create dress ideas and if you chew your food improperly or make too much

entities.entity_description: Phantom Thread는 1950년대 런던을 배경으로 한 영화로, 꼼꼼한 드레스 제작자와 그의 뮤즈이자 연인이 되는 여성의 이야기를 다룬다
Paul Thomas Anderson은 Phantom Thread의 감독이다
Daniel Day-Lewis는 Phantom Thread에서 주연을 맡은 배우로, 이 작품이 그의 마지막 연기작으로 알려져 있다
Reynolds는 1950년대 런던의 꼼꼼한 드레스 제작자로, 자신을 패션 디자이너보다는 예술가로 여기는 매우 진지한 인물이다. 아침에 노트패드를 들고 앉아 드레스 아이디어를 구상한다
Alma는 Reynolds의 뮤즈가 되었다가 결국 그의 연인이 되는 여성이다
Broadcast Film Critics Association은 영화 비평가 협회로, Critics Choice Awards를 주관한다

relationships.relationship_description: Paul Thomas Anderson은 Phantom Thread를 감독했다
Daniel Day-Lewis는 Phantom Thread에서 주연을 맡았다
Reynolds와 Alma는 처음에는 예술가와 뮤즈 관계였다가 연인 관계로 발전한다

PAUL THOMAS ANDERSON.description: PAUL THOMAS ANDERSON -> PAUL THOMAS ANDERSON
